meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7978.

td.p: Wayne Erxleben, an engineer from Fort Wayne, Indiana
Silvija Ozols, a copy editor from Astoria, New York
James Holzhauer, a professional sports gambler from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 14-day cash winnings total $1,061,554)

tr.td: WHERE AM I?
SNAKE, BIRD OR MONKEY
CAR TALK
WOMEN ON TV
TIME CAPSULE TIME
GIVE ME A "MINUTE"
